/* eslint-disable jsx-a11y/alt-text */ import React, { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import Products from "./Product"; import {Container, Card, Button }from 'react-bootstrap'; import Topping from "./Topping"; import '../CSS/Index.css' const ProductDetail = () => { const {id} = useParams() //int const dataProduct = [] for ( let index = 0; index

{dataProduct[0].title}

Rp. {dataProduct[0].price}
Toping
<>
{Topping.map((Topping)=>( {Topping.title} ))}
Total
{dataProduct[0].price}
 ) } export default ProductDetail
